statements: SELECT * FROM defects LIMIT 10
SELECT defect_id, product_name, defect_date FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 100
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM defects WHERE root_cause = 'Hardware'
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE product_name LIKE '%Pro%' ORDER BY defect_date ASC
SELECT defect_id, product_name FROM defects WHERE defect_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT defect_id, product_name, defect_description, defect_date, root_cause FROM defects WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT defect_id, product_name, root_cause FROM defects WHERE defect_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY defect_date DESC
SELECT defect_id, product_name, root_cause FROM defects WHERE root_cause LIKE '%manufacturing%'
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_date > '2022-03-01' AND defect_date < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY defect_date ASC
SELECT defect_id, product_name, defect_description, defect_date FROM defects WHERE product_name = 'Product B' AND root_cause IS NULL
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_description FROM ProductDefects WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, defect_description FROM ProductDefects WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
SELECT * FROM RootCauseAnalysis JOIN ProductDefects ON RootCauseAnalysis.defect_id = ProductDefects.id;
SELECT id, root_cause_description FROM RootCauseAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects WHERE defect_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, defect_description FROM ProductDefects WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductDefects ORDER BY defect_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_description FROM ProductDefects WHERE defect_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM RootCauseAnalysis JOIN ProductDefects ON RootCauseAnalysis.defect_id = ProductDefects.id WHERE ProductDefects.product_name = 'Example Product';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Cosmetic';
SELECT * FROM root_causes ORDER BY cause_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date, product_status FROM products WHERE product_status = 'Approved';
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM root_causes JOIN defects ON root_causes.defect_id = defects.defect_id;
SELECT MAX(defect_id) AS max_defect_id FROM defects;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM defect_tracking;
SELECT product_name, defect_type FROM defect_tracking ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT defect_description FROM defect_tracking WHERE defect_type = 'Critical';
SELECT product_name, detection_date FROM defect_tracking WHERE detection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM defect_location WHERE location_name LIKE '%Production%';
SELECT * FROM defect_tracking ORDER BY detection_date DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_description FROM defect_tracking WHERE defect_type='Hardware';
SELECT dt.product_name, ra.root_cause, ra.analysis_date FROM defect_tracking dt INNER JOIN root_cause_analysis ra ON dt.id = ra.defect_id WHERE ra.analysis_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT dl.location_name, dt.product_name, dr.resolution FROM defect_tracking dt INNER JOIN defect_location dl ON dt.id = dl.defect_id INNER JOIN defect_resolution dr ON dt.id = dr.defect_id WHERE dl.location_name='Production Floor';

SELECT dt.product_name, dr.resolution, dl.location_name FROM defect_resolution dr INNER JOIN defect_tracking dt ON dr.defect_id = dt.id INNER JOIN defect_location dl ON dt.id = dl.defect_id WHERE dr.resolution_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY dt.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM defects;
SELECT defect_name, defect_category, defect_date FROM defects WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT analyzed_by, analysis_date FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE defect_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT defect_name, defect_date FROM defects WHERE defect_category = 'Quality Control'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC

SELECT products.product_name, defects.defect_name, defect_date FROM products JOIN product_history ON products.id = product_history.product_id JOIN defects ON product_history.defect_id = defects.id WHERE product_history.action_taken = 'Resolved'
SELECT defect_name, COUNT(*) AS defect_count FROM defects GROUP BY defect_name HAVING defect_count > 2
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, suppliers.supplier_location, products.product_name FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.id = products.supplier_id
